about_the_game:
Experience Vending Dokan!: Kozy Kiosk with this free demo, offering unrestricted gameplay up to Milestone 5!

Please note that this is a demo of Vending Dokan which will release in Early Access, as such you might experience bugs or some features might feel unfinished or unpolished. We are keen to hear your feedback about Vending Dokan so please do let us know what you think of the demo on either our Discord or Steam Forums!

Build and manage your own vending machine business in this cozy idle sim, where you can design unique locations, hire staff, and watch your business grow. Whether you’re actively fine-tuning every detail or letting it run passively in the background, the demo lets you explore the core mechanics at your own pace.

Set up vending machines in various city spots, transforming ordinary streets and alleys into bustling hotspots. Decorate each location with plants, lights, and themed items to attract more customers and increase sales. In this demo, all gameplay systems are fully available up to Milestone 5, giving you a true feel for how vending locations evolve and how different management styles can shape your business.

With its relaxing atmosphere and engaging progression, Vending Dokan! is designed for both active play and background gaming. The demo lets you experience the cozy visuals, tactile interactions, and soothing soundtrack while growing your vending empire. Whether you’re fully immersed or letting it run while you work or unwind.

name: Vending Dokan!: Kozy Kiosk Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 960 / AMD Radeon HD7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1660 Super / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Get a taste of Vending Dokan with this free demo, playable up to Milestone 5! Experience the mechanics available at this stage, from brand deals to decorating venues, all while growing your vending business. Play actively or let it run in the back with a handcrafter music playlist to accompany you.
